Module Contents#

viz.__author__ = 'tiantheunissen@gmail.com'#
viz.__description__ = 'Contains various functions to visualize KnowIt data structures.'#
viz.logger#
viz.train_color = 'rebeccapurple'#
viz.valid_color = 'deeppink'#
viz.eval_color = 'crimson'#
viz.back_color = 'black'#
viz.grid_color = 'dimgray'#
viz.generic_figsize = (10, 6)#
viz.large_figsize = (20, 11.25)#
viz.WIDE_figsize = (40, 11.25)#
viz.TALL_figsize = (20, 24)#
viz.generic_dpi = 200#
viz.quick_dpi = 100#
viz.generic_cmap = 'plasma'#
